title: Vegetarian Moroccan stew with couscous
ingredients: ['30g raisins', '2 tablespoons olive oil', '1 (3cm) piece fresh ginger, very finely chopped', '2 onions, sliced into rings', '2 cloves garlic, crushed', '1 carrot, sliced', '250g sweet potatoes, cubed', '1 courgette, cubed', '500ml vegetable stock', '2 tablespoons tomato puree', '1/2 teaspoon sambal chilli paste', '100g couscous', '100g tinned chickpeas, drained', 'salt and pepper, to taste', '2 tablespoons finely chopped parsley']
